name: WHO IS THAT GD TWITTER USER?
name_original: WHO IS THAT GD TWITTER USER?
description:
guess the name of a geometry dash twitter users in 5 seconds or less

made this scuffed game because of a dumb tweet

apply here if you want to be in the game and i might add you in the future idk: https://forms.gle/6s9DXj6ZnP84P7UJ8

thanks for playing :)

this game is unaffiliated with geometry dash or Robtop Games.
